Comment: The response provides a solid interpretation of the biblical passage in Matthew 19:12, linking it to the value of celibacy for the kingdom of God. The only area for improvement would be to delve deeper into the biblical perspective on celibacy and perhaps provide more specific references to relevant biblical teachings on the topic.
